Comment.MultiLanguageText: Worst Quality Code
OSLevel variable
relevant, if StateOpAct is true; manual command variable; 0 to Cmd: command request from Operator; Cmd to 0: acknowledge by PEA
relevant, if StateAutAct is true and SrcIntAct is true; automatic-internal command variable
relevant, if StateAutAct is true and SrcExtAct is true; automatic-external command variable; 0 to Cmd: command request from External; Cmd to 0: acknowledge by PEA
relevant, if StateOpAct is true; manual procedure variable; 0 to ProcdureId: Procedure request from Operator; ProcdureId to 0: acknowledge by PEA
relevant, if StateAutAct is true and SrcIntAct is true; automatic-internal procedure variable
relevant, if StateAutAct is true and SrcExtAct is true; automatic-external command variable; 0 to ProcdureId: Procedure request from External; ProcdureId to 0: acknowledge by PEA
current state variable
command enable variable
current procedure variable
requested procedure variable
position test ID variable
interaction question ID variable
interaction additional info variable
interaction answer ID variable
Current operation mode interaction channel; 0: The operator switches (*Op) shall be used; 1: The automatic switches (*Aut) shall be used
Set operation mode to Offline by automatic interaction (relevant, if StateChannel is true).
Set operation mode to Operator by automatic interaction (relevant, if StateChannel is true).
Set operation mode to Automatic by automatic interaction (relevant, if StateChannel is true); 1: Operation mode is set to Automatic; 0: no operation
Set operation mode to Offline by operator interaction (relevant, if StateChannel is false); 0 to 1: request to set operation mode to Offline; 1 to 0: acknowledge by PEA
Set operation mode to Operator by operator interaction (relevant, if StateChannel Is false); 0 to 1: request to set operation mode to Operator; 1 to 0: acknowledge by PEA
Set operation mode to Automatic by operator interaction (relevant, if StateChannel is false); 0 to 1: request to set operation mode is to Automatic; 1 to 0: acknowledge by PEA
1: current mode is Offline; 0: current mode is not Offline
1: current mode is Operator; 0: current mode is not Operator
1: current mode is Automatic; 0: current mode is not Automatic
selection of the active source mode interaction channel; 0: The operator switches (*Op) shall be used; 1: The automatic switches (*Aut) shall be used.
Set source mode to External by automatic interaction (relevant, if SrcChannel is true); 1: Source mode is set to External; 0: no operation
Set source mode to Internal by automatic interaction (relevant, if SrcChannel is true); 1: Source mode is set to Internal; 0: no operation
Set source mode to Internal by operator interaction (relevant, if SrcChannel is false); 0 to 1: request to set operation mode to Internal; 1 to 0: acknowledge by PEA
Set source mode to External by operator interaction (relevant, if SrcChannel is false); 0 to 1: request to set operation mode to External; 1 to 0: acknowledge by PEA
relevant if service operation mode is Automatic; 1: current mode is Internal; 0: current mode is not Internal; relevant if service operation mode is not Automatic; 0: current mode is not Internal
relevant if service operation mode is Automatic; 1: current mode is External; 0: current mode is not External; relevant if service operation mode is not Automatic; 0: current mode is not External
Flag to signalize if new values for Procedure Parameters can be applied; 1: new value can be applied; 0: currently, no new value can be applied

External Value Application Flag for all Procedure Parameters of the service; 0 to 1: request to apply the values of VExt, VOp, or VInt depending on the currently active individual ServiceOperationMode and ServiceSourceMode of the Procedure Parameters of the Service; 1 to 0: acknowledge by PEA

Manual Value Application Flag for all Procedure Parameters of the service; 0 to 1: request to apply the values of VExt, VOp, or VInt depending on the currently active individual ServiceOperationMode and ServiceSourceMode of all Procedure Parameters of the Service; 1 to 0: acknowledge by PEA

Internal Value Application Flag for all Procedure Parameters of the service; 01: request to apply the values of VExt, VOp, or VInt depending on the currently active individual ServiceOperationMode and ServiceSourceMode of all Procedure Parameters of the Service; 1 to 0: acknowledge by PEA
Flag to signalize if new values for Configuration Parameters can be applied; 1: new value can be applied; 0: currently, no new value can be applied

External Value Application Flag for all Configuration Parameters of the service; 0 to 1: request to apply value of VExt, VOp, or VInt depending on the currently active individual ServiceOperationMode and ServiceSourceMode of all Configuration Parameters of the Service; 1 to 0: acknowledge by PEA

Manual Value Application Flag for all Configuration Parameters of the service; 0 to 1: request to apply value of VExt, VOp, or VInt depending on the currently active individual ServiceOperationMode and ServiceSourceMode of all Configuration Parameters of the Service; 1 to 0: acknowledge by PEA

Internal Value Application Flag for all Configuration Parameters of the service; 0 to 1: request to apply value of VExt, VOp, or VInt depending on the currently active individual ServiceOperationMode and ServiceSourceMode of all Configuration Parameters of the Service; 1 to 0: acknowledge by PEA
Freeze Flag for all ReportValues of the service; 1: All ReportValues of the Service have to be frozen; 0: The ReportValues are not frozen
